005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
012
013/**
014 * Provides a convenient way to raise a
015 * {@link TypeMetapathException#INVALID_TYPE_ERROR}.
016 */
017public class InvalidTypeMetapathException
018    extends TypeMetapathException {
019
020  /**
021   * the serial version UID.
022   */
023  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
024
025  @Nullable
026  private final IItem item;
027
028  /**
029   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code item} and {@code cause},
030   * using a default message.
031   *
032   * @param item
033   *          the item related to the invalid type error
034   * @param cause
035   *          the original exception cause
036   */
037  public InvalidTypeMetapathException(@NonNull IItem item, @NonNull Throwable cause) {
038    super(INVALID_TYPE_ERROR, String.format("Invalid data type '%s'", item.getClass().getName()),
039        cause);
040    this.item = item;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code item} and no cause, using
045   * a default message.
046   *
047   * @param item
048   *          the item related to the invalid type error
049   */
050  public InvalidTypeMetapathException(@NonNull IItem item) {
051    super(INVALID_TYPE_ERROR, String.format("Invalid data type '%s'", item.getClass().getName()));
052    this.item = item;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code item}, {@code message},
057   * and {@code cause}.
058   *
059   * @param item
060   *          the item related to the invalid type error
061   * @param message
062   *          the exception message
063   * @param cause
064   *          the original exception cause
065   */
066  public InvalidTypeMetapathException(@Nullable IItem item, @Nullable String message, @NonNull Throwable cause) {
067    super(INVALID_TYPE_ERROR, message, cause);
068    this.item = item;
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code item}, {@code message},
073   * and no cause.
074   *
075   * @param item
076   *          the item related to the invalid type error
077   * @param message
078   *          the exception message
079   */
080  public InvalidTypeMetapathException(@Nullable IItem item, @Nullable String message) {
081    super(INVALID_TYPE_ERROR, message);
082    this.item = item;
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Get the associated item, if provided for the exception.
087   *
088   * @return the item or {@code null} if not item was provided
089   */
090  @Nullable
091  public IItem getItem() {
092    return item;
093  }
094}
